alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of northern Lemhi, southeastern Missoula, western Granite and central Ravalli Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from Victor to 8 miles northwest of Gibbonsville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Watch for changeable road conditions as brief heavy snow sticks to roadways. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Stevensville, Victor, Conner, Woodside, Sula, Grantsdale, Lost Trail Pass, Bell Crossing, Skalkaho Pass, Corvallis, and Charlos Heights. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 0 and 26, near mile marker 34, and between mile markers 39 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys
